verbs.description: [ARG0: Russian President Vladimir Putin] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: gave] [ARG1: a cautiously positive response to President Trump ’s calls for his country ’s readmission to what used to be the G8] , and played down what he called the “ internal problems ” in the G7 following the forum ’s tumultuous summit in Canada .

Russian President Vladimir Putin on Sunday gave a cautiously positive response to President Trump ’s calls for his country ’s readmission to what [V: used] to be the G8 , and played down what he called the “ internal problems ” in the G7 following the forum ’s tumultuous summit in Canada .
